meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bulky.
meanings.sent1: The bulkinesses of the furniture made it difficult to move around the room.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with the bulkinesses of her winter coat as she tried to zip it up.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the bulkinesses of his suitcase, saying it was like dragging a small elephant around.
meanings.sent4: The bulkinesses of the old building seemed to weigh down on the entire street.
meanings.sent5: The bulkinesses of the package made it stand out among the other parcels.

meanings.definition: The condition of having a large size or volume.
meanings.sent1: The bulkinesses of the boxes filled up the entire storage room.
meanings.sent2: Despite its bulkinesses, the car was surprisingly easy to maneuver through traffic.
meanings.sent3: The bulkinesses of the cake made it impossible to fit in the small fridge.
meanings.sent4: The bulkinesses of the tree branches cast long shadows on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The bulkinesses of the crowd made it hard to see the stage at the concert.
